name: Breakout (itch) (geoshocker56)
description:
Welcome to Breakout.

Please extract the Zip file , and run the exe file inside. 

This is just the beginning, i am planning on including several new exciting game features. some include :

- high score system

- fully functional power up system

- more levels available

and a lot more. Please add any suggestions on the comments and have fun!

P.S. there are a couple of cheats in the game that make it easier
